benchmark_details.name: VLKEB (Large Vision-Language Model Knowledge Editing Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark designed to assess and improve the capabilities of knowledge editing methods in the field of LVLMs, featuring more reliable data collection methods and an extended Portability metric.
benchmark_details.data_type: editing cases with image and text inputs

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve knowledge editing methods for LVLMs.

data.format: JSON along with images sorted by entity IDs
data.annotation: Manually constructed using GPT for question generation.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation metrics are calculated based on the proportion of correct answers produced by edited models across different inputs.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate effective editing and retention of knowledge integrity, while low scores highlight performance deficiencies.
methodology.validation: Evaluation conducted on five different LVLMs.
